class job_monitoring_app.trackerapi.trackerapi.api.TrackerApi(api_key, base_url=None, skip_verify=False)¶

Bases: object

TrackerAPI wrapper around the backend service to make requests to create studies, and send events.

verify_api_key()¶

Makes a get request to the apikeys url to verify the api key, which is inserted into the headers
